Paper: [Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback](https://arxiv.org/abs/2203.02155) and [How would Stance Detection Techniques Evolve after the Launch of ChatGPT?](https://arxiv.org/abs/2212.14548)
Why should we care: InstructGPT (precursor model to ChatGPT) and the use of ChatGPT and  large language models for explainable stance detection

In this hands-on session Abubakar Abid showcases tools and resources for machine and deep learning on the Hugging Face Hub. Practical use cases include searching for loading and deploying models as well as datasets for various machine learning tasks.
